Name: Jacktus Green: The Fluffy, the Spiky and the Spicy
About the game: Welcome to Sofrito Town, a fantasy city set in the Wild West, ruled by plants! Help Jacktus Green, a bounty hunter, who has been tricked into betting his pet Cattus in a poker game against the dangerous outlaw Guindilla. She is planning to use Cattus to find golden avocados, and Jacktus wants to recover his beloved friend! ðŸŒµ Travel through 5 different levels: Discover new locations, skills and enemies, while the world reacts to your presence. Complete each zone as fast as you can to beat the previous mark! ðŸŒµ Explore: Investigate and find hidden places, and discover the secrets of Sofrito Town! ðŸŒµ Boss Fight: Challenge Guindilla in three unique encounters. ðŸŒµ Destroy: Break walls and crates, throw dynamite and unleash chaos! COMING SOON! ðŸŒµ Shop: Collect all the gold pieces you can find and exchange them for many goodies!
